title: Tracing the spread of infection
creator_credit: Jack Chambers, Nucleus Film Unit, British Ministry of Health and Michael Clarke
brief_description: Contains the only known film records of the phage typing test and the coagulose test. It demonstrates how these tests can be used to trace a strain of staphylococcus back to the source in a human carrier.
creator_credit_for_label: Jack Chambers, Nucleus Film Unit, British Ministry of Health and Michael Clarke
description: Contains the only known film records of the phage typing test and the coagulose test. It demonstrates how these tests can be used to trace a strain of staphylococcus back to the source in a human carrier.
